post:
![](https://kts24.com/img/kts24_logo.png "")
Hello, we are KTS24, an internationally active cloud provider from the heart of Germany in the beautiful Eifel. We rent out KVM server series for different areas of application from Teamspeakserver, over Minecraftserver up to Dedicated Server solutions.

A striking feature of Haendler.IT lies hidden in our origins.

From a common hobby the interest and the fun in the work grew. The binding enthusiasm ensures that we don't just work, but burn for work and were forged into a team on the anvil of daily challenges and ups and downs.


![](https://kts24.com/img/advent.jpg "")

Due to the strong rush in 2018 and the enquiries from your side, we have decided to repeat our Advent campaign for you this year.

Behind 24 doors we have hidden great offers for you. Open a new door every day and find the right offer for you.


https://kts24.com/special_offers

At 0 (UTC+1) o'clock we will start with the first offer:

> CPU: 4 Cores
> RAM: 8 GB 
> HDD: 80 GB SAS HDD Storage
> 
## for 4,99 € per month
